system.description:
Drive fast, live smarter.

You own a vehicle large enough for your team - describe the vehicle on your character sheet. While driving this vehicle, gain +2 to Driving checks. On a critical roll, you may perform a cinematic driving maneuver with your vehicle (GM discretion), and adjust your Chase Die by and additional -1 to +1
